website_summaries.verdict: With its features, tasty results, and spaciousness, this model is definitely worth considering if you want a gas grill without spending a lot of money.
pros: This gas grill offers user-friendly features for an affordable price, such as the swing-away warming rack, 3 burners, and 500 square inches of cooking space
We love the even results thanks to the brand's TRU-Infrared system
cons: Build doesn't feel quite as durable as previous generation Char-Broil grills or pricier gas-powered options

website_summaries.verdict: Provides the precise heating technology of infrared, which makes it worth considering.
pros: of grill space and a warming rack with swing-away capability when not in use
Users love the even cooking of the infrared heat
cons: Some owners say the construction doesn't have the same durable feel as older models, especially the sheet metal of the cabinet panels

customer_reviews.title: Good but disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Grill came a little damaged, not too bad, looks good, heats well. Problem I have is after one use the cooking surface is heavily pitted. Kinda looks like it's a year old now. Looked great when I put it together, not it is pitted after one use. Very disappointing as a realize I will need to replace it soon. Also very had to clean, most grills allow stuff to fall through, this you have to scrape off and out. Kinda nasty.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Nequist

customer_reviews.title: Poor craftsmanship!  Grates rusted out after 2 months and VERY limited use!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product and received it 6/1/2017. I've used it about 5 times since assembled / new. On 8/23/2017 (less than 2 months old), I noticed that the cooking grates were heavily rusted and the porcelain coating on them has chipped off. I have never cooked on 1 of the grates (no food has ever touched it)! The grill stays covered with the Char-Broil cover all of the time, except when cooking. I'd love to receive 3 replacement grates, but have no idea how to get in touch with the seller (they appear to have gone out of business). Guess I'll be buying a different grill next season... :(
customer_reviews.author: Brian Koch

customer_reviews.title: We really love this grill
customer_reviews.text: We really love this grill. The only reason I took a star away was because the front panel was bent upon delivery. We were already an hour into putting it together so just got a wrench and made it work. Also, be aware of the bright yellow paper, loose, with the instructions. It details an issue in the diagram (how to secure the gas line to the ignition switch) which is unclear in the installation manual. I didn't take the time to look at the yellow sheet until after I had wasted about 20 minutes trying (with no luck) to figure out that step via the instruction manual. We enjoyed the grill that night - and every night since!
customer_reviews.author: Mantamy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, damaged, poor paint on grill surface
customer_reviews.text: The grill arrived bent up. The terrible instructions included made it impossible to construct. The grilling surface is painted and the paint had flaked off when it was bent up in shipping. Don't bother with this and get a Weber or at least something with a cast or stainless grilling surface. This model is cheap as they come and really could have you eating paint if it flaked off onto your food.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R

customer_reviews.title: This grill is awesome. Cooks evenly and if you like things a ...
customer_reviews.text: This grill is awesome. Cooks evenly and if you like things a little burned on the outside the meat is still moist and tender on the inside. Love this grill.
customer_reviews.author: Margee

customer_reviews.title: Nice grill but the infrared grates suck.
customer_reviews.text: It's nice but food gets stuck in the grates. Swapped them out for regular grates and it's WAY better.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Reierson

customer_reviews.title: Good grill, but grates rusted quickly
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the grill, it heats up fast and cooks everything thoroughly. My one complaint about it is my grates are not rusting, the description say they are rust-resistant, but i noticed rust after the 1st year and now into my second year there is a significant amount of rust on the grates. I am not sure what is causing the grates to rust so quickly. I use the cold nylon brushes specifically so as not to cause scratching or nicks on the porcelain but somehow rust has shown up significantly on the grates.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Golsky

customer_reviews.title: Love the full grill Radiant heat concept.
customer_reviews.text: We love the full grill radiant heat. Thanks to Hurricane Irma, we have not had much time to try the grill on other BBQ likes. Nice construction.. Took me about 2 hours to put together (I'm slow because I "actually read the instructions" :)
customer_reviews.author: Pirate at heart

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty good grill for the price but it has a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good grill for the price but it has a few flaws. First the wheels are too small to roll easily on my wood deck, and second the fat collection device is poorly designed and difficult to empty. The first time I went to empty it, ( accessible from the back ) it got all bent out of shape and I had to reform it, very flimsy ! I guess you really do get what you pay for. No problem with the lighting and cooking features, however the grill itself is a little harder to clean than others I have had.
customer_reviews.author: charpie

customer_reviews.title: Horrible to keep clean! Prone to grease fires.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I throughly liked my last Char Broil. This mess of a grill however has been a complete disappointment. It all comes down to its griddle-like grates that contain tiny holes to allow heat to pass through. They clog easily, which traps grease and has twice already caused problems grilling. Never have I ever had to keep baking soda so close to the grilling area when cooking. It gets cleaned after every use, but it still creates problems. I'm definitely looking for something else next year.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly D

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Grill
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together; works great! Loved my last infrared grill with the complete pan between the burners and the grill. This one utilizes slotted grill for the infrared component--very effective but not quite the same caliber as the other type. Still, great looking and functioning grill for a fantastic price. Have used it all winter in the sub freezing temps and love it.
customer_reviews.author: MC Sombra

customer_reviews.title: Opened and BBQ grill was dented.
customer_reviews.text: BBQ grill got here fast but was damaged in the box and we didn't notice till we we're putting it together. Over all ok grill it's the one my husband wanted for Father's day because of the grill plates but I'm disappointed that it couldn't be perfect for him and that it pretty much looks beat up.
customer_reviews.author: Candieda

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely an amazing grill! Simple setup! Customer service was very helpful with registering the grill for the warranty. The grill it's self is beautiful! It cooks even better, meats are always juicy and never flares up so far! Definitely would recommend! Best grill I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: A.J.

customer_reviews.title: Cooks Great, East Assembly, Mostly intact shipping
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the nicest grills I've ever owned. There's nothing under $500 that comes close. My only complaint was that some components were bent a little. Nothing that prevented assembly or ended up visible, and it's expected that something this big and heavy is going to get banged up coming by mail.
customer_reviews.author: Whitey in PA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice grill, but putting together was a challenge. Only pictures, no written instruction on how things fit together..
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie R. Bryon

customer_reviews.title: Happy Grilling!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Grilled our first steaks and they came out perfect. NO flare-up, just what we were looking for. We had a 4-burner and this one seems to have more heat and just as much cooking space. One item that was surprising was that we thought the 3-burner would be smaller, but the cooking space is the same and the grill size is the same as our old Char-Broil 4-burner.
customer_reviews.author: David P. Carney

customer_reviews.title: It's a great, super-hot grill until the thin porcelain coating on ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a great, super-hot grill until the thin porcelain coating on the grates start chipping and the grates rust. This will happen much sooner than you expect. As directed, I cleaned the grates before and after grilling with a nylon brush and I kept it in a garage which shielded it from the elements.
customer_reviews.author: John Keats

customer_reviews.title: so happy to be finally grilling again.
customer_reviews.text: This grill is great, and such a steal!!! Granted gas is not the preferred method of cooking over charcoal, but man does it heat quickly and evenly. The infrared, heating keeps the food juicy and allows you to get a good sear on any steaks you throw it's way. Would recommend it to anyone looking for an affordable gas grill.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Cikanovich

customer_reviews.title: Nice but get someone to put it together for you.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of parts. Hired someone to put together for us. Works like a charm. Not too big or too small for the two of us.
customer_reviews.author: sara stanford

customer_reviews.title: Worst grill ever
customer_reviews.text: Takes forever to heat up and if you open the lid it takes forever to get back up to temp. Grilling time is extra long because it doesn’t put off enough heat. Worst grill I’ve ever had.
customer_reviews.author: DANNY HUMPHREYS

customer_reviews.title: It cooked wonderfully.. such an even cook
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time this weekend.. It cooked wonderfully.. such an even cook. No flare ups ... So pleased with my purchase. Not hard to put together. It took 2 people to make it faster.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product.
customer_reviews.text: Is not true infra red. Flare ups are still there. Misleading ad. Would not recommend. Would send back if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.

customer_reviews.title: Bad paint and
customer_reviews.text: Worst buy ever. Paint was chipping off after 3rd grilling. Cooks well but a grill is a joke. Attaching photo to show how it looks after 1 month. Every cook i need to clean this. I was using their brush btw
customer_reviews.author: Tom Witley

customer_reviews.title: It ok but not if you want to use the ...
customer_reviews.text: It ok but not if you want to use the wood chip boxes for smoke. Wish I had order a different one.
customer_reviews.author: NCM

customer_reviews.title: Cooks hotter and quicker - Amazing
customer_reviews.text: The TRU infrared is amazing. If you have an option to buy a traditional gas grill or one with TRU infrared I would highly recommend spending the little extra money on It.
customer_reviews.author: faredv

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Only used it three time so far, but it cook ever good. Good even temperature across the grill.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL S

customer_reviews.title: love this grill
customer_reviews.text: love this grill - wow this was a huge heavy box, took some time putting it together but it put together perfectly with the directions.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Eiles

customer_reviews.title: awfull grates
customer_reviews.text: extremelly hard to clean and now not even 1 year since i bought it the grate painting is dismantling. I feel very disapointed with the product. Will try to get in contact with charbroil and see if they can solve this issue
customer_reviews.author: Wylliam

customer_reviews.title: No Screws!!
customer_reviews.text: I went to put the grill together and it didn't come with screws to screw the stand together. 😡
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble works better than regular gas grills
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble works better than regular gas grills. TRU infrared does not burn food no matter how hard you try, has built in beer holder and can cook pizza at the same time
customer_reviews.author: Brenda G

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Gas Grill!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent gas grill!!! I've never seen a grill rack like this one has. I love it. Cooks up food awesome. Its a little pricey, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: John J Kleek

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat the price for this awesome grill...
customer_reviews.text: Best grill I ever owned! Cooks quickly & evenly every time!
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee

customer_reviews.title: They love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a housewarming gift. They love it !!!
customer_reviews.author: Jean A. Geary

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This grill is fantastic and is a fraction of the cost of lesser models in the stores
customer_reviews.author: Tim s

customer_reviews.title: Great grill for serious grillers
customer_reviews.text: I have a smaller version of this grill. The larger one should have the same igniter as the small ones. All in all a great grilling experience. My daughter can even use it. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: jonathon fife

customer_reviews.title: Love everything about this grill
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this grill. Even heating throughout the whole surface. The only reason it's not 5 stars from me is that the cooking surface is a little hard to clean. Even with this minor issue, I would but it again.
customer_reviews.author: Acar K.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the end product but I felt like the ...
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the end product but I felt like the purchase came from IKEA. Might have been a billion pieces. An engineers dream, my own personal nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I won't go back to the traditional way
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations. Even when I accidentally over cook the food, it's still comes out juicy
customer_reviews.author: Shads

customer_reviews.title: ... have used it a couple of times and really happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I put it together with no problem and have used it a couple of times and really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Chrystal

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product, no problems in just over 2 years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Read the directions. We've had the infrared bbq before and are enjoying this one just as much!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget G.

customer_reviews.title: One of the main sides was dented to the point ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the main sides was dented to the point I could barely put it together. It took a long time to bend everything back, and now the whole back of the grill has a huge dent in it.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Reed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Second One , It cant flame up even with fatty meat
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love it and it's better than we thought. This grill make food quick and amazing! You'll love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love cooking on it, easy to clean, its just the cats ass...
customer_reviews.author: Roy Stitt

customer_reviews.title: Great grill would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: This is a great grill. Fires up easily and gets hot really fast. The food comes off hot a really juicy. This grill is amazing for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Hefner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works fantastic and has lots of grill space. Been very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Grainger

customer_reviews.title: There is not a cold spot on this Grill
customer_reviews.text: Great Grill but a pain to clean. Get ready for some scrubbing
customer_reviews.author: E davis

customer_reviews.title: Looks like the product was a returned item
customer_reviews.text: I received this item with a box violeted. Looks like the product was a returned item. One of the conector os broken and my grill isn’t turning on
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love the Char Broil BBQ's
customer_reviews.text: We love the Char Broil BBQ's. Used to have the patio size one and just upgraded to the bigger one. The infrared technology is amazing. Chicken has never tasted better. Great for vegetables as well.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent easy assembly easy clean up great even flame for cooking top rate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just a grill
customer_reviews.text: I had the previous model and LOVED it. Ordered this one. It took 2 hours to put together which is comparable to other users. It looked nice. It is NOT infrared and flare-ups still happen. Probably would not order again if I had the opportunity.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Lower end char broil grill
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in 2 days via Ups. Boxes was intact but several panels had minor dents. Grill cooks well but quality is sub part, wish I would have spent another $100 and got a better grill. I looked at it at Lowe's first and thought is was decent. Thin flimsy metal, battery holder for ignition is very very cheap, cap for battery compartment is also mounting nut, hope it last more than first year.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Bent part
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this grill with high hopes.. haven't used it yet, but upon assembly I noticed the back wall was bent.. not too noticeable though. But when I tried to put it together ,it made my day a living hell. None of the screw holes matched up at all . My hands hurt :(
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: I am used to a standard propane bbq. Still ...
customer_reviews.text: I am used to a standard propane bbq. Still haven't gotten the hang of this one. Chicken seems to take a lot longer than I am used to. The flavor isn't the same. I will probably switch back once I have the money to buy another just for the flavor alone.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Great grill especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together, about 50 minutes. Grills food evenly and makes great grill marks. The grill gets very hot to sear in great flavor in meat and veggies. Flare ups are nonexistent due to the grate design.
customer_reviews.author: Food Doode

customer_reviews.title: Great grill, easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: if it was easier to clean i'd give it 5 stars. Great grill, easy to put together, even heat, plenty of heat, i love it, j just wish it was a little easier to clean
customer_reviews.author: Brian Norman

customer_reviews.title: Danger danger fire hazard.
customer_reviews.text: Good grill if it worked. Assembling item wasnt too bad except for dealing with bent metal parts as other people have commented on. Thats not the worst part. First time firing it up, all went well for a moment. Just about done cooking brats and chicken until fire started shooting out the side hole (see pics) where the propane tank was at. The regulator valve that screws into the propane tank apparently had a leak. Thankfully I was able to close the tank and then had to put the fire out. Never leave grill unattended!!!
customer_reviews.author: David Lee

customer_reviews.title: Grill works great but the packaging was severely damaged and a couple ...
customer_reviews.text: Grill works great but the packaging was severely damaged and a couple pieces were slightly bent making it more difficult to assemble. Nothing a little muscle couldn't handle though. And Amazon was very fair to offer a discount for the damages.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Grill ever
customer_reviews.text: Best Grill I ever owned. I love the way this thing cooks.Food comes out evenly no matter where you place it on the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Zmank9

customer_reviews.title: Broken gas valve
customer_reviews.text: My husband put the grill together and the valve that conects the side burner is broke.Its the shut off valve that conects the gas to the stovetop burner.We don't want to have to send the whole thing back and have to put another grill together.I wondered if there was another way to make it right?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Char-Broil Performance TRU Infrared 500 works great, but it was damaged in shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Teri A. Chriesman

customer_reviews.title: Very easily assembled! My only complaint is that two part ...
customer_reviews.text: Grill works very well! Very easily assembled! My only complaint is that two part of the grill arrived dented, and the front cabinet doors are not in alignment. Outside of these cosmetic issues, the grill is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grill works fine. The wheels when they screw into the grill ...
customer_reviews.text: Grill works fine. The wheels when they screw into the grill are weak and broke where they screw into the grill after 10 months. I got warranty replacment on the part but had to take the whole grill part to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: spencer norris

customer_reviews.title: Grill appears to be well constructed, and the assembly ...
customer_reviews.text: Grill appears to be well constructed, and the assembly was far easier than others I have purchased. Very solid, and can not wait to start using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Does not cook steaks as flavorful as a standard gas grill and definitely not as good as Charcoal.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis R Bolestridge

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! Poor Quality. Knobs Melted off, unsafe!
customer_reviews.text: Minor issue: Putting it together was fairly straight forward except one of the screws that supports the right side tray did not screw in due to horrible/inconvenient placing and poor manufacturing quality. MAJOR ISSUE: Right burner knob melted and fell off on 2nd use and no longer reliable! Clearly there are heating and insulation problems because above that knob the metal is all discolored from the heat dissipating and heating the metal casing in that area. This results in the metal housing above the knobs to be extremely UNSAFE and anyone can very easily burn themselves. SAVE YOUR MONEY AND BUY A BETTER BRAND! I will never recommend a Char-Broil to anyone ever again. Poor customer service as well!
customer_reviews.author: soccrosse

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gets stopped up to fast like old one better not infrared but is char Broil. sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2nd one in 10 years!
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this to replace the charbroil infrared model i had. That one lasted me 10 years. It was an amazing grill. I liked it so much that i replaced it with the newest model of the same grill.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Matangelo

product_meta.title: Char-Broil Performance TRU-Infrared 500 3-Burner Cabinet Liquid Propane Gas Grill
product_meta.description: The Char-Broil Performance TRU-Infrared 500 is a 3-burner gas grill featuring Char-Broil's TRU-Infrared cooking system. The TRU-Infrared technology provides better performance with greater temperature range and control. Features a 500-square inch cooking surface, one 10,000 BTU side burner, a fixed stainless steel side shelf, and a cabinet with stainless steel doors which hide the propane tank and allow for additional storage. Sits on four casters for increased mobility- two of which lock- to keep the grill in place while in use. Measures 56.7-inches wide x 45.5-inches high x 23.4-inches deep.
feature_bullets: 500 square inches of primary cooking over porcelain-coated grates
180 square inch porcelain-coated swing-a-way rack for warming
Three top-ported tube burners for lasting performance and better temperature control
Surefire Electronic ignition system offers a reliable spark at every burner

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars142 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
